name: Child of the Storm
description:
Follow Nym in her quest to become the next summoner.

A short game made in 4 weeks in a team of 4. This game is a students project as part of a gamedesign course. 

Feel free to comment, share and discuss here. 

A project done by:

(Me) Gabriel Martin - Artist and Design 

https://gabrielmartingd.wixsite.com/portfolio

Gabriel Jean - Programmation and Game Design 

https://gabrieljean021.wixsite.com/portfolio

Geneviève Bellemare - Narration and Level Design

 https://genevievebellemare.wordpress.com/

Thank you for your time! :)
